services.title: More Bookings Coming In. Less Time Spent Worrying About Tech.

items.title: People Book While You're Busy
items.text: Someone finds you online at 9pm, scrolling through options on their phone. If your website lets them book right there, they will. If it doesn't, they'll move on to someone else. A good website catches those people. The ones browsing after work, the ones who hate phone calls. Your calendar fills up in the background while you're doing literally anything else.

items.title: You Actually Look Like the Professional You Are
items.text: Most people make up their minds about a business within a few seconds of landing on their website. A handful of seconds. If what they see looks outdated or confusing, they're gone. Doesn't matter how good you are at what you do. They'll never find out. A clean, professional site gives people confidence before they've even met you. It says "this person takes their business seriously" without a word.

items.title: You Don't Have to Think About Any of This
items.text: Websites can be annoying. Updates, plugins, hosting renewals, random things breaking for no obvious reason. Most business owners either spend hours trying to figure it out themselves or just let it sit there gathering dust. We take that whole situation off your hands. Something needs updating? We do it. Something breaks? We fix it. The website runs, it works, and you get on with treating people.

features.title: Everything's Already in There
features.text: Six things come standard with every website we build. No tiers, no "premium upgrades," no surprises three months down the line when you realise you need something that costs extra. It's all included from day one.

items.title: Change Whatever You Want, Whenever You Want
items.text: Prices go up? New treatment on the menu? Better photos? Send us an email. We'll have it updated within 24 hours, usually faster. No extra charges, no limits on requests.

items.title: Built for Phones First
items.text: Roughly 75% of people looking for a massage are doing it from their phone. Every button is easy to tap. Every form is simple to fill out. Everything loads quickly.

items.title: Properly Fast
items.text: Slow websites lose people. Three seconds of waiting and they hit the back button. Ours score between 95 and 100 on Google's speed tests. Pages load almost instantly.

items.title: Clean Code, Proper SEO
items.text: We don't use bloated website builders. Everything is hand-coded, clean, and structured the way Google likes it. Meta tags, schema markup, all the technical bits that help you rank.

items.title: Actually Made for Thai Massage
items.text: This isn't a generic template with a logo swap. The whole thing is designed around what Thai massage businesses need. Service pages laid out properly. Design elements that feel authentic.

items.title: Multiple Languages, One Website
items.text: Your customers might speak English, German, Italian, Spanish. We build the site in any languages you need. Visitors switch between them with one click.
